full_description:
Poly Voyager 6200 UC Bluetooth Headset

The Poly Voyager 6200 UC Bluetooth Headset design gives you the ability to leave out the earbuds for in-person conversations, but always have them comfortably at hand when you need them for hands-free calling, or to just listen to your favorite audio. The Poly Voyager 6200 UC Headset utilizes Bluetooth technology to wirelessly connect to your devices. With its support for multiport technology, it can pair with up to eight devices, and actively connect with two of them simultaneously. Support for Class 1 Bluetooth means that you can enjoy your wireless connection from up to 98' away when the Voyager 6200 is paired with a Class 1 device. If you want to connect the headset to a Mac or Windows PC that lacks Bluetooth, you can use the included USB Type-A Bluetooth adapter. During your conversation, four omnidirectional microphones, digital signal processing (DSP), and active noise canceling technology work to optimize your voice's clarity, and minimize ambient noise. The headset can vibrate to let you know you have an incoming call, provided your connected phone or device is in Bluetooth range, while a voice alert warns you if the microphones are muted while you're talking. Additional voice alerts can announce talk time remaining and connection status. It has 2 years of warranty.
